entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 3 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
